com.github.mathiewz.slick.particles

Class ParticleIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mathiewz.slick.particles.ParticleIO

  • public class ParticleIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to (de)serialize ConfigureEmitters to and from XML
    Author:
    kevin
